#summary How to install TTGMaster.

= Downloading =

An installation file can be found http://www.mediafire.com/file/tmiyiyjomzk/TTGMasterv1.0setup.exe . Download this file.


= Installation =

Run TTGMasterv1.0setup.exe. Follow the installation guide. Enjoy!

= Uninstalling = 

To uninstall run the TTGMasterv1.0setup.exe executable again. If already installed, this should run through the uninstall process for TTGMaster.
